title: Greatest NFL Story NEVER Told (feat. Miko Grimes)
itunes:author: Andrew Schulz's Flagrant with Akaash Singh
itunes:summary: Schulz and Akaash sit down with Miko Grimes wife of NFL Pro Bowl corner Brent Grimes. Miko dishes on how QB’s are snitches for the team, gay NFL athletes, how teams ruin your image to pay you less and why Drew Brees is better than Tom Brady. INDULGE!
itunes:subtitle: Schulz and Akaash sit down with Miko Grimes wife …
description: Schulz and Akaash sit down with Miko Grimes wife of NFL Pro Bowl corner Brent Grimes. Miko dishes on how QB’s are snitches for the team, gay NFL athletes, how teams ruin your image to pay you less and why Drew Brees is better than Tom Brady. INDULGE!
